code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import'./FeaturedEvents.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function FeaturedEvents(){const[events,setEvents]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{fetch('http://localhost:5000/api/events').then(response=>response.json()).then(data=>setEvents(data)).catch(error=>{console.error('Error fetching events:',error);setEvents([]);});},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("section",{className:"featured-events-section","data-aos":"fade-up",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Featured Events"}),events.length===0?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"No upcoming events available."}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{className:"events-list",children:events.map(event=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{className:"event-item",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:event.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"event-date",children:event.date}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:event.description})]},event.id))})]})});}export default FeaturedEvents;
